channel.title: PortForwarding?
channel.description: Yeah, this is the only problem I'm having with my server so far besides the compiler and runserver, when you portforward to allow people to connect to your computer and play on your server your apparently supposed to have a router or adapter, and I don't have a router so how do I portforward to let people on my server?

item.title: PortForwarding?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

okay, thanks, but what’s a static IP? I’m new at this and don’t know much

Read full topic

item.title: PortForwarding?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You don’t need to portforward. You only need to configure your static IP.

Read full topic
